Gladwell, host of the podcast Revisionist History and #1 bestselling author of The Tipping Point, Blink, Outliers, David and Goliath, and What the Dog Saw, offers a powerful examination of our interactions with strangers---and why they often go wrong. How did Fidel Castro fool the CIA for a generation? Why did Neville Chamberlain think he could trust ? Why are campus sexual assaults on the rise? Do television sitcoms teach us something about the way we relate to each other that isn't true?\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eTalking to Strangers is a classically Gladwellian intellectual adventure, a challenging and controversial excursion through history, psychology, and scandals taken straight from the news. He revisits the deceptions of Bernie Madoff, the trial of Amanda Knox, the suicide of Sylvia Plath, the Jerry Sandusky pedophilia scandal at Penn State University, and the death of Sandra Bland---throwing our understanding of these and other stories into doubt. Something is very wrong, Gladwell argues, with the tools and strategies we use to make sense of people we don't know. And because we don't know how to talk to strangers, we are inviting conflict and misunderstanding in ways that have a profound effect on our lives and our world.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eIn his first book since his #1 bestseller, David and Goliath, Malcolm Gladwell has written a gripping guidebook for troubled times.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. So what do you do when it's your turn?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIncreasingly, identity theft is a fact of life. We might once have hoped to protect ourselves from s with airtight passwords and aggressive spam filters, and those are good ideas as far as they go. But with the breaches of huge organizations like Target, , JPMorgan Chase, Sony, Anthem, and even the US Office of Personnel Management, more than a billion personal records have already been stolen, and chances are good that you're already in harm's way.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThis doesn't mean there's no hope. Your identity may get stolen, but it doesn't have to be a life-changing event. Adam Levin, a longtime consumer advocate and identity fraud expert, provides a method to help you keep s, phishers, and spammers from becoming your problem.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eLevin has seen every scam under the sun: fake companies selling \"credit card insurance\"; criminal, medical, and child identity theft; that promise untold riches for some personal information; catphishers, tax fraud, fake debt collectors who threaten you with legal action to confirm your account numbers; and much more. As Levin shows, these folks get a lot less scary if you see them coming.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eWith a clearheaded, practical approach, Swiped is your guide to surviving the identity theft epidemic. * over 800,000 copies sold ARE YOU TEMPTED TO GO TO BUSINESS SCHOOL? SAVE YOUR MONEY AND READ THE PERSONAL MBA INSTEAD. This bestselling business classic gives you everything you need to transform your business and your career. An MBA at a top business school is an enormous investment in time and cash. And if you don't want to work for a consulting firm or an investment bank, the chances are it simply isn't worth it. The Personal MBA gives you simple mental models for every subject that's key to commercial success. From the basics of products and marketing to the nuances of teamwork and systems, this book distils everything you need to know to take on the MBA graduates and win. 'File this book under: NO EXCUSES' Seth Godin'No matter what they tell you, an MBA is not essential. If you combine reading this book with actually trying stuff, you'll be far ahead in the business game' Kevin Kelly, founder of Wired\n\u003cbr /\u003ePhiên bản kỷ niệm 10 năm * Được sửa đổi và cập nhật hoàn toàn * hơn 800.000 bản đã được bán ra BẠN CÓ MUỐN ĐẾN TRƯỜNG KINH DOANH KHÔNG? TIẾT KIỆM TIỀN VÀ ĐỌC MBA CÁ NHÂN THAY THẾ. Cuốn sách kinh doanh kinh điển bán chạy nhất này cung cấp cho bạn mọi thứ bạn cần để chuyển đổi doanh nghiệp và sự nghiệp của mình. Bằng MBA tại một trường kinh doanh hàng đầu là một sự đầu tư rất lớn về thời gian và tiền bạc. Và nếu bạn không muốn làm việc cho một công ty tư vấn hoặc một ngân hàng đầu tư thì rất có thể công việc đó không xứng đáng. MBA Cá nhân cung cấp cho bạn những mô hình tư duy đơn giản cho mọi môn học, đây là chìa khóa thành công về mặt thương mại. Từ những kiến thức cơ bản về sản phẩm và tiếp thị cho đến các sắc thái của tinh thần đồng đội và hệ thống, cuốn sách này chắt lọc mọi thứ bạn cần biết để có thể cạnh tranh với những sinh viên tốt nghiệp MBA và giành chiến thắng. 'Ghi cuốn sách này vào mục: KHÔNG CÓ LÝ DO' Seth Godin'Dù họ có nói gì với bạn đi nữa, bằng MBA là không cần thiết. \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eGood Thinking: A Teenager's Guide To Managing Stress And Emotion Using CBT\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003ePractical help for teenagers navigating negative emotions, stress and self-defeating behaviour.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAlthough most of us pay little attention to our emotions, feelings like anxiety, anger, frustration, guilt and sadness can have a huge impact on our lives. Sometimes we get stuck in negative ways of thinking that perpetuate these emotions, even when what is happening in our lives is not that bad.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eTeenage years can be a particularly challenging time. There are lots of changes happening - physical, social and mental, and emotional ups and downs are common. Upsetting emotions can lead to self-defeating behaviours, such as avoidance, irritability, withdrawal and brooding.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eWhile our emotions seem to have a life of their own, there are actually lots of things we can do to affect them. Learning skills to manage unhelpful emotions can make our lives much easier, now and into the future. They can also help us to get back on track more quickly when things go wrong.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eCognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) is an approach used by therapists all over the world to help people learn to think in a healthy and balanced way, and to bounce back more quickly from stressful events. It provides techniques to help overcome stress, negative emotions and\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eself-defeating behaviour. Bestselling author of Change Your Thinking, Sarah Edelman, and Louise Remond, a specialist in therapy for teenagers, explain how to use these skills with clarity and compassion. The book contains plenty of real-life examples, practical tools and exercises. These strategies have a proven track record, and are valuable skills for a happier and more confident life.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eMicrosoft's interview process is a notoriously gruelling sequence of brain-busting questions that separate the most creative thinkers from the merely brilliant. So effective is their technique that other leading corporations - from the high-tech industry to consulting and financial services - are modelling their own hiring practices on Bill Gates' unique approach. HOW WOULD YOU MOVE MOUNT FUJI? reveals for the first time more than 35 of Microsoft's puzzles and riddles, such as: * Why does a mirror reverse right and left but not up and down? * If you could eliminate one U.S. state, which would it be? * How many piano tuners are there in the world? And for the first time, this book supplies answers and approaches using creative analytical thinking that works. \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWealth Secrets: How the Rich Got Rich\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDiscover how the superwealthy made it to the top (and you can too!)\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eFrom the richest Romans to the robber barons to today's bankers and tech billionaires, Sam Wilkin offers Freakonomics-esque insights into what it really takes to make a fortune. These stories of larger-than-life characters, strategies, and sacrifices reveal how the wealthiest did it, usually by a passion for finding loopholes, working around bureaucratic systems, and creating obstacles to competitors.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eWealth Secrets of the One Percent gets at the heart of our feelings about the 1% of top income earners and the roughly 0.0001% who achieve billionaire status: we love to hate them, but we'd love to be them. Wilkin's insight into the sources of wealth is thought-provoking and rigorous, and he reveals that behind almost every great fortune is a \"wealth secret\" -- a moneymaking technique designed to defeat the forces of market competition.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/9c/7e/be/bf8d1a41b23a1b701639332132415cc8.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/9c/7e/be/bf8d1a41b23a1b701639332132415cc8.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/9c/7e/be/bf8d1a41b23a1b701639332132415cc8.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/9c/7e/be/bf8d1a41b23a1b701639332132415cc8.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/9c/7e/be/bf8d1a41b23a1b701639332132415cc8.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/6b/bf/4f/553133144ed356b6e89dcfcd7892dbfe.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/6b/bf/4f/553133144ed356b6e89dcfcd7892dbfe.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/6b/bf/4f/553133144ed356b6e89dcfcd7892dbfe.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/6b/bf/4f/553133144ed356b6e89dcfcd7892dbfe.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/6b/bf/4f/553133144ed356b6e89dcfcd7892dbfe.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/30/a3/e8/32eda8878ef63a76886bd2c8bc07ee6b.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/30/a3/e8/32eda8878ef63a76886bd2c8bc07ee6b.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/30/a3/e8/32eda8878ef63a76886bd2c8bc07ee6b.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/30/a3/e8/32eda8878ef63a76886bd2c8bc07ee6b.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/30/a3/e8/32eda8878ef63a76886bd2c8bc07ee6b.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/86/97/5d/1a1c62fb122458bf60d115dabe07f5f6.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/86/97/5d/1a1c62fb122458b \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThink Like A Rocket Scientist: Simple Strategies You Can Use To Make Giant Leaps In Work And Life\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e* One of 's \"6 Books You Need to Read in 2020 (According to Bill Gates, Satya Nadella, and Adam Grant)\"\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e* Adam Grant's # 1 pick of his top 20 books of 2020\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e* One of 6 Groundbreaking Books of Spring 2020 (according to Malcolm Gladwell, Susan Cain, Dan Pink, and Adam Grant).\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eA former rocket scientist reveals the habits, ideas, and strategies that will empower you to turn the seemingly impossible into the possible.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eRocket science is often celebrated as the ultimate triumph of technology. But it's not. Rather, it's the apex of a certain thought process -- a way to imagine the unimaginable and solve the unsolvable. It's the same thought process that enabled Neil Armstrong to take his giant leap for mankind, that allows spacecraft to travel millions of miles through outer space and land on a precise spot, and that brings us closer to colonizing other planets.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eFortunately, you don't have to be a rocket scientist to think like one.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn this accessible and practical book, Ozan Varol reveals nine simple strategies from rocket science that you can use to make your own giant leaps in work and life -- whether it's landing your dream job, accelerating your business, learning a new skill, or creating the next breakthrough product. Today, thinking like a rocket scientist is a necessity. We all encounter complex and unfamiliar problems in our lives. Those who can tackle these problems -- without clear guidelines and with the clock ticking -- enjoy an extraordinary advantage.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThink Like a Rocket Scientist will inspire you to take your own moonshot and enable you to achieve liftoff.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eGet Money: Live The Life You Want, Not Just The Life You Can Afford\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eLearn how to live the life you want, not just the life you can afford in this highly engaging, step-by-step guide to winning at personal finance!\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eManaging your money is like going to the dentist or standing in line at the DMV. Nobody wants to do it, but at some point, it's inevitable: you need to clean your teeth, renew your license, and manage your personal finances like a grown-up. Whether you're struggling to pay off student loan debt, ready to stop living paycheck to paycheck, or have finally accepted that your Beanie Baby collection will never pay off, tackling your finances may seem immensely intimidating. But it doesn't have to be. In fact, by approaching it as a game--or something that requires you to set clear goals, as well as face challenges you must \"beat\"--personal finance can not only be easy to understand, but it can also be fun!\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn Get Money, personal finance expert Kristin Wong shows you the exact steps to getting more money in your pocket without letting it rule your life. Through a series of challenges designed to boost your personal finance I.Q., interviews with other leading financial experts, and exercises tailored to help you achieve even your biggest goals, you'll learn valuable skills such as:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Building a budget that (gasp) actually works\u003cbr\u003e - Super-charging a debt payoff plan\u003cbr\u003e - How to strategically hack your credit score\u003cbr\u003e - Negotiating like a shark (or at least a piranha)\u003cbr\u003e - Side-hustling to speed up your money goals\u003cbr\u003e - Starting a lazy investment  many more!\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eSimply put, with this gamified guide to personal finance, you'll no longer stress about understanding how your finances work--you'll finally \"get\" money.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ePlays Well With Others: The Surprising Science Behind Why Everything You Know About Relationships Is (Mostly) Wrong\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAN INSTANT USA TODAY and PUBLISHERS WEEKLY BESTSELLER\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eFrom the author of the Wall Street Journal bestseller Barking Up the Wrong Tree comes a cure-all for our increasing emotional distance and loneliness—a smart, surprising, and thoroughly entertaining guide to help build better friendships, reignite love, and get closer to others, whether you’re an extrovert or introvert, socially adept or socially anxious.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eCan you judge a book by its cover? \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIs a friend in need truly a friend indeed? \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDoes love conquer all? \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIs no man an island? \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn Plays Well with Others, Eric Barker dives into these age-old maxims drawing on science to reveal the truth beyond the conventional wisdom about human relationships. Combining his compelling storytelling and humor, Barker explains what hostage negotiation techniques and marital arguments have in common, how an expert con-man lied his way into a twenty-year professional soccer career, and why those holding views diametrically opposed to our own actually have the potential to become our closest, most trusted friends.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eInside you will learn:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThe two things essential to making friends – and what Dale Carnegie got wrong.\u003cbr\u003e What creates love, reignites love, and sustains love. (There’s no Build-A-Bear store for a happy marriage but this is close.)\u003cbr\u003e The ethical and effective way to get your partner to change.\u003cbr\u003e How social media can actually improve relationships.\u003cbr\u003e The antidote to loneliness and why what we usually hear doesn’t work.\u003cbr\u003e And so much more. The book is packed with high-five-worthy stories about the greatest female detective to ever live, the most successful liar to ever open his mouth, genius horses, thieving hermits, the perils of perfect memories, and placebos. Leveraging the best evidence available—free of platitudes or magical thinking—Barker analyzes multiple sides of an issue before rendering his verdict. What he’s uncovered is surprising, counterintuitive, and timely—and will change the way you interact in the world and with those around you just when you need it most.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/a4/c2/ab/035dfb28c0ae9f312caf48ce0990ce3e.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/a4/c2/ab/035dfb28c0ae9f312caf48ce0990ce3e.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/a4/c2/ab/035dfb28c0ae9f312caf48ce0990ce3e.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/a4/c2/ab/035dfb28c0ae9f312caf48ce0990ce3e.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/a4/c2/ab/035dfb28c0ae9f312caf48ce0990ce3e.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/a7/d3/b5/a022e83b9f7a3aa07dea837a9d1a9e24.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/a7/d3/b5/a022e83b9f7a3aa07dea837a9d1a9e24.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/a7/d3/b5/a022e83b9f7a3aa07dea837a9d1a9e24.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/a7/d3/b5/a022e83b9f7a3aa07dea837a9d1a9e24.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/a7/d3/b5/a022e83b9f7a3aa07dea837a9d1a9e24.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/ef/77/18/a1798159ece22f72a02b0704a7f6dcce.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/ef/77/18/a1798159ece22f72a02b0704a7f6dcce.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/ef/77/18/a1798159ece22f72a02b0704a7f6dcce.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ef/77/18/a1798159ece22f72a02b0704a7f6dcce.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ef/77/18/a1798159ece22f72a02b0704a7f6dcce.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/46/17/ed/01c81bc1653b8c5ba90e807e3afdaa02.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/46/17/ed/01c81bc1653b8c5 \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTwelve And A Half: Leveraging The Emotional Ingredients Necessary For Business Success\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eUSA Today Bestseller\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eIn his sixth business book, bestselling author, entrepreneur, and investor Gary Vaynerchuk explores the twelve essential emotional skills that are integral to his life—and business—success and provides today’s (and tomorrow’s) leaders with critical tools to acquire and develop these traits.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eFor decades, leaders have relied on “hard” skills to make smart decisions, while dismissing the importance of emotional intelligence. Soft skills like self-awareness and curiosity aren’t quantifiable; they can’t be measured on a spreadsheet and aren’t taught in B-schools or emphasized in institutions. We’ve been taught that emotional intelligence is a “nice to have” in business, not a requirement. But soft skills can actually accelerate business success, Gary Vaynerchuk argues. For analytical minds, it’s challenging to understand how to get “better” at being self-aware, curious, or empathetic—or even why it’s important to try. \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn this wise and practical book, Gary explores the 12 human ingredients that have led to his success and happiness and provides exercises to help you develop these traits yourself. He also shares what the “half” is—that emotional ingredient of leadership he’s weakest at and makes the most effort to improve. Working through the ideas and exercises in the book, he teaches you how to discover your own “halves” and offers insight on how to strengthen them. \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eGary’s secret to success is using these twelve traits in varying mixtures, depending on the situation. But how do we know when to balance patience with ambition? Humility with conviction? Gary provides real-life examples involving common business scenarios to show you how to use them together for optimum results. \u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThis iconoclastic book will help you refine your ingredients and improve your leadership capabilities. When implemented in the proper situation, these ingredients can help leaders land promotions, retain core employees, move faster than competitors, win the loyalty of customers, and build successful organizations that last. \u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu Why was he wrong?\u003cbr /\u003eRobert and Edward Skidelsky argue that wealth is not - or should not be - an end in itself, but a means to 'the good life'. Tracing the concept from Aristotle to the present, they show how far modern life has strayed from that ideal. They reject the idea that there is any single measure of human progress, whether GDP or 'happiness', and instead describe the seven elements which, they argue, make up the good life, and the policies that could realize them.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eROBERT SKIDELSKY is Emeritus Professor of Political Economy at the University of Warwick. His biography of Keynes received numerous prizes, including the Lionel Gelber Prize and the Council on Foreign Relations Prize for International Relations. He was made a life peer in 1991, and a Fellow of the British Academy in 1994.\u003cbr /\u003eEDWARD SKIDELSKY is a lecturer in the Philosophy Department of the University of Exeter. He contributes regularly to the \u003cem\u003eNew Statesman\u003c/em\u003e, \u003cem\u003eSpectator\u003c/em\u003e and \u003cem\u003eProspect\u003c/em\u003e. finance, savings, and portfolio made Danielle Town’s eyes glaze over, and the thought of stocks and financial statements shut down her brain. The daughter of a successful investor and bestselling financial author of\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eRule #1\u003c/em\u003e, Phil Town, she spent most of her adult life avoiding investing—until she realized that her time-consuming career as lawyer was making her feel anything but in control of her life or her money. Determined to regain her freedom, vote for her values with her money, and deal with her fear of the unpredictable stock market, she turned to her father, Phil, to help her take charge of her life and her future through Warren Buffett-style value investing. Over the course of a year, Danielle went from avoiding everything to do with the financial industrial complex to knowing exactly how and when to invest in wonderful companies.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn\u003cem\u003e\u0026nbsp;Invested\u003c/em\u003e, Danielle shows you how to do the same: how to take command of your own life and finances by choosing companies with missions that match your values, using the same gold standard strategies that have catapulted Warren Buffett and Charlie Munger to the top of the\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eForbes\u003c/em\u003e\u0026nbsp;400. Avoiding complex math and obsolete financial models, she turns her father’s investing knowledge into twelve easy-to understand lessons.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn each chapter, Danielle examines the investment strategies she mastered as her increasing know-how deepens the trust between her and her father. - now in paperback.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHow should we live properly in a world of chaos and uncertainty?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eJordan Peterson has helped millions of people, young and old, men and women, aim at a life of Now he can help you.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDrawing on his own work as a clinical psychologist and on lessons from humanity's oldest myths and stories, Peterson offers twelve profound and realistic principles to live by. After all, as he reminds us, we each have a vital role to play in the unfolding destiny of the world.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDeep, rewarding and enlightening,\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003e12 Rules for Life\u003c/em\u003e\u0026nbsp;is a lifeboat built solidly for stormy seas: ancient wisdom applied to our contemporary problems.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. game-changing state of mind a person can adopt is the notion that success is in the journey itself. Because the fact is, there are simply too many variables out of our control to define our success on outcomes only. Life is not a winner-take-all championship game but a an excruciatingly long season with multiple chances every day to learn from losses, grow from successes, and make the appropriate changes along the way.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn 3 Things Successful People Do, New York Times bestselling author, coach, and speaker John C. Maxwell provides insight into what it means to truly be on the journey to success. The results for hundreds of thousands of women have been career opportunities they never thought possible-at every stage of their career, from entry-level to the corner office! Too Late To Be Great\u003c/strong\u003e is about the power of thinking long. Drawing on wide research into 'lead time' and the 'ten-year rule', bestselling personal development author Tom Butler-Bowdon shows that, contrary to popular belief, people, companies, products and ideas invariably need time to realise their potential. At the age you are now, many famous and remarkable people were only just getting into their stride - and it's likely that you have more time than you think to achieve your goals. It's never too late to begin the journey of being or doing something remarkable. This book will show you how.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành.  style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-size: medium; color: #0000ff;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQuiet: The Power Of Introverts In A World That Can't Stop Talking\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAt least one-third of the people we know are introverts. They are the ones who prefer listening to speaking; who innovate and create but dislike self-promotion; who favor working on their own over working in teams. It is to introverts-Rosa Parks, Chopin, Dr. Seuss, Steve Wozniak-that we owe many of the great contributions to society.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn Quiet, Susan Cain argues that we dramatically undervalue introverts and shows how much we lose in doing so. She charts the rise of the Extrovert Ideal throughout the twentieth century and explores how deeply it has come to permeate our culture. She also introduces us to successful introverts-from a witty, high-octane public speaker who recharges in solitude after his talks, to a record-breaking salesman who quietly taps into the power of questions. Passionately argued, superbly researched, and filled with indelible stories of real people, Quiet has the power to permanently change how we see introverts and, equally important, how they see themselves.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eNow with Extra Libris material, including a reader’s guide and bonus content.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Anyone seeking a path to self-improvement will find Hill's plan for implementing and maintaining a productive, can-do mind-set enlightening, accessible, and extremely effective. In this straightforward, illuminating guide, you'll discover the secrets of staying focused on your goals and objectives, turning problems into opportunities, overcoming fear of failure, channeling creative energy, maximizing your unique talents  much more. Complete with questionnaires, work sheets, self-tests, planning strategies, and inspiring quotes from celebrated figures such as Harry S. Truman, Albert Schweitzer, and Frank Lloyd Wright - along with real-life examples of people who have achieved success by maintaining a positive mental attitude - Napoleon Hill's Keys to Positive Thinking will give you the tools you need to enhance and transform your life.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Why are people successful? For centuries,  humankind   has grappled with this question, searching for the secret to    accomplishing great things. In this stunning new book, Malcolm  Gladwell   takes us on an invigorating intellectual journey to show us  what makes   an extreme overachiever. He reveals that we pay far too  much attention   to what successful people are like, and too little  attention to where   successful people are from: their culture, their  family, and their   generation. Gladwell examines how the careers of  Bill Gates and the   performance of world-class football players are  alike, what top fighter   pilots and The Beatles have in common, why so  many top lawyers are   Jewish, why Asians are good at maths, and why it  is correct to say that   the mathematician who solved Fermat's Theorem  is not a genius. Just as   he did in \"Blink\", Gladwell overturns many of  our conventional notions   and creates an entirely new model for seeing  the world. questions.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eIn showing how the great philosophers of human history lived and thought – and what they thought about – Peter Cave provides an accessible and enjoyable introduction to thinking philosophically and how it can change our everyday lives. He addresses questions such as: Is there anything 'out there' that gives meaning to our lives? Does reality tell us how we ought to live? What indeed is reality and what is appearance – and how can we tell the difference?\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eThis book paints vivid portraits of an assortment of inspiring thinkers: from Lao Tzu to Avicenna to Iris Murdoch; from Hannah Arendt to Socrates and Plato to Karl Marx; from Kierkegaard and Nietzsche to Sartre to Samuel Beckett – and let us not forget Lewis Carroll for some thought-provoking fantasies and Ludwig Wittgenstein for the anguishes of a genius. As well as displaying optimists and pessimists, believers and non-believers, the book displays relevance to current affairs, from free speech to abortion to the treatment of animals to our leaders' moral character.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eCave brings to life these often prescient, always compelling philosophical thinkers, showing how their ways of approaching the world grew out of their own lives and times and how we may make valuable use of their insights today. Now, more than ever, we need to understand how to live, and how to understand the world around us.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. truths\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eIt is the amusing and enlightening story of four characters who live in a maze and look for cheese to nourish them and make them happy. Cheese is a metaphor for what you want to have in life, for example a good job, a loving relationship, money or possessions, health or spiritual peace of mind. The maze is where you look for what you want, perhaps the organisation you work in, or the family or community you live in. The problem is that the cheese keeps moving.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eIn the story, the characters are faced with unexpected change in their search for the cheese. One of them eventually deals with change successfully and writes what he has learned on the maze walls for you to discover. You'll learn how to anticipate, adapt to and enjoy change and be ready to change quickly whenever you need to.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cbr /\u003eDiscover the secret of the writing on the wall for yourself and enjoy less stress and more success in your work and life. \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eEach year about 28 million Americans begin a search for a new job. Many more live in the age of the permanent job search, their online profiles eternally awaiting a better offer. Job seekers are more mobile and better informed than ever, aspiring to work for employers offering an appealing culture, a robust menu of perks, and opportunities for personal fulfillment and advancement. The result is that millions of applications stream to the handful of companies that regularly top listings of the best companies to work for: Apple, Netflix, Amazon, Alphabet, , SpaceX, Oracle, Pricewaterhouse-Coopers, and others. Tesla has received as many as 200 applications for each open position. How do selective employers choose which people to hire? Anxiety\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e'This powerful book will help you tackle stress and learn more about yourself in the process' Sir Clive Woodward OBE\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAre you feeling stressed at work? Is it 'good' stress, 'bad' stress? Or has it turned into 'ugly' stress?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eFor some, there is a high price to pay for ambition and success. The toll it can take on our mental health can be significant, particularly if we are born with the 'Worry' gene.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn Beat Stress at Work, management trainer Mark Simmonds helps you understand the effects stress and anxiety can have on your mental health and provides tools and advice to help you to find your way through work-induced struggles.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eSharing his own brutally honest journey and using his corporate experience, Mark sheds light on the difficulty of discussing mental health with colleagues and employers and identifies the best ways for navigating your way through a mental health crisis.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThe book:\u003cbr\u003e • Encourages you to maintain positive mental health by better understanding yourself and finding a career that suits your most authentic self.\u003cbr\u003e • Shows you how to return safely to the workplace after a period of mental ill health and communicate effectively with your peers and managers.\u003cbr\u003e • Demonstrates how your resilience 'muscle' can help you fulfil your ambitions in the professional arena, while being mindful of your mental health.\u003cbr\u003e • Pinpoints some of the key lessons from COVID-19 about stress management and the working environment.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThrough the advice in this book, you will learn that your mental health issues may not be the barriers you view them as but may hold value in the workplace. Mark shows you that it is possible to be ambitious and successful at work because of, not in spite of, the mental health challenges you may face.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Done\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eA modern, no-nonsense guide to getting rid of anxiety, reclaiming your productivity, and spending more time on the work that matters.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eLet's face it: Email is killing our productivity. The average person checks their 11 times per hour, processes 122 messages a day, and spends 28 percent of their total workweek managing their inbox. What was once a powerful and essential tool for doing our daily work has become a near-constant source of frustration, anxiety, and distraction from our work.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eUnsubscribe will show you how to tame your inbox and reclaim your focus, with tips on how to:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Break free from addiction and the \"inbox zero\" obsession\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Build a daily routine that reduces stress and anxiety\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Process your inbox based on what (and who) really matters to you\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Write messages that get people to pay attention and take action\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Set boundaries and say \"no\" to time-wasting distractions\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Plan your day around meaningful work -- not busywork\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eProductivity isn't about just \"keeping busy,\" it's about leaving a legacy. Are you ready to Unsubscribe?\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. In \u003cspan class=\"a-text-italic\"\u003eAct Like a Success, Think Like a Success\u003c/span\u003e, Steve Harvey tells you how to achieve your dreams using the gift you already have. Every one of us was born with a gift endowed by our creator - something you do the best at with very little effort. While it can be like someone else's, your gift is yours alone. No one can take it away. You are the only one who can use it - or waste it.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSteve shows how that gift holds your greatest chance at success, and the fulfillment of your life's mission and purpose. He helps you learn to define your gift - whether it's being a problem solver, a people-connector, a whiz with numbers, or having an eye for colors. He makes clear that your job is not your gift; you may use it in your work, but it can also be used in your marriage or relationship, your community, and throughout every aspect of your life. Throughout, he provides a set of principles that will help you direct your gift. \"The scriptures say your gift will make room for you and put you in the presence of great men,\" Steve reminds us. \"This book is your roadmap to identifying your gift, acknowledging it, perfecting it, connecting it to a vehicle, and riding it to success. class=\"text-justify\"\u003eWhy Startups Fail: A New Roadmap For Entrepreneurial Success\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003ch2 class=\"text-justify\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eIf you want your startup to succeed, you need to understand why startups fail.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003e \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e“Whether you’re a first-time founder or looking to bring innovation into a corporate environment, \u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003eWhy Startups Fail\u003c/em\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e is essential reading.”—Eric Ries, founder and CEO, LTSE, and \u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003eNew York Times\u003c/em\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e bestselling author of \u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003eThe Lean Startup\u003c/em\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e and \u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003eThe Startup Way\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003eWhy do startups fail? That question caught Harvard Business School professor Tom Eisenmann by surprise when he realized he couldn’t answer it.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003eSo he launched a multiyear research project to find out. In \u003cem\u003eWhy Startups Fail,\u003c/em\u003e Eisenmann reveals his findings: six distinct patterns that account for the vast majority of startup failures.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eBad Bedfellows. \u003c/strong\u003eStartup success is thought to rest largely on the founder’s talents and instincts. But the wrong team, investors, or partners can sink a venture just as quickly.\u003cbr /\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eFalse Starts. \u003c/strong\u003eIn following the oft-cited advice to “fail fast” and to “launch before you’re ready,” founders risk wasting time and capital on the wrong solutions.\u003cbr /\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eFalse Promises. \u003c/strong\u003eSuccess with early adopters can be misleading and give founders unwarranted confidence to expand.\u003cbr /\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eSpeed Traps. \u003c/strong\u003eDespite the pressure to “get big fast,” hypergrowth can spell disaster for even the most promising ventures.\u003cbr /\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eHelp Wanted. \u003c/strong\u003eRapidly scaling startups need lots of capital and talent, but they can make mistakes that leave them suddenly in short supply of both.\u003cbr /\u003e• \u003cstrong\u003eCascading Miracles. \u003c/strong\u003eSilicon Valley exhorts entrepreneurs to dream big. But the bigger the vision, the more things that can go wrong.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003eDrawing on fascinating stories of ventures that failed to fulfill their early promise—from a home-furnishings retailer to a concierge dog-walking service, from a dating app to the inventor of a sophisticated social robot, from a fashion brand to a startup deploying a vast network of charging stations for electric vehicles—Eisenmann offers frameworks for detecting when a venture is vulnerable to these patterns, along with a wealth of strategies and tactics for avoiding them.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp class=\"text-justify\"\u003eA must-read for founders at any stage of their entrepreneurial journey, \u003cem\u003eWhy Startups Fail \u003c/em\u003eis not merely a guide to preventing failure but also a roadmap charting the path to startup success.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu giá","favourite_count":0,"thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/280x280/ts/product/c6/1f/2a/b0f7ba86bf53c866cbf135444080fe52.jpg","has_ebook":false,"inventory_status":"available","inventory_type":"backorder","productset_group_name":"","is_fresh":false,"seller":null,"is_flower":false,"has_buynow":true,"is_gift_card":false,"salable_type":null,"data_version":3300,"day_ago_created":505,"all_time_quantity_sold":18,"meta_title":"","meta_description":"","meta_keywords":"","is_baby_milk":false,"is_acoholic_drink":false,"description":"\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eStart with Why : How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003eThe inspiring, life-changing bestseller by the author of LEADERS EAT LAST and TOGETHER IS BETTER\u003cstrong\u003e.\u003cbr /\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eIn 2009, Simon Sinek started a movement to help people become more inspired at work, and in turn inspire their colleagues and customers. Since then, millions have been touched by the power of his ideas, including more than 28 million who’ve watched his TED Talk based on START WITH WHY -- the third most popular TED video of all time.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eSinek starts with a fundamental question: Why are some people and organizations more innovative, more influential, and more profitable than others? Why do some command greater loyalty from customers and employees alike? Even among the successful, why are so few able to repeat their success over and over?\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003ePeople like Martin Luther King Jr., Steve Jobs, and the Wright Brothers had little in common, but they all started with WHY. They realized that people won't truly buy into a product, service, movement, or idea until they understand the WHY behind it. \u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eSTART WITH WHY shows that the leaders who've had the greatest influence in the world all think, act, and communicate the same way -- and it's the opposite of what everyone else does. Sinek calls this powerful idea The Golden Circle, and it provides a framework upon which organizations can be built, movements can be led, and people can be inspired. unpublicized secret that 80 percent of all our results in business and in life stem from a mere 20 percent of our efforts.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe 80/20 principle is one of the great secrets of highly effective people and organizations.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eDid you know, for example, that 20 percent of customers account for 80 percent of revenues? That 20 percent of our time accounts for 80 percent of the work we accomplish? The 80/20 Principle shows how we can achieve much more with much less effort, time, and resources, simply by identifying and focusing our efforts on the 20 percent that really counts. Although the 80/20 principle has long influenced today's business world, author Richard Koch reveals how the principle works and shows how we can use it in a systematic and practical way to vastly increase our effectiveness, and improve our careers and our companies.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe unspoken corollary to the 80/20 principle is that little of what we spend our time on actually counts. But by concentrating on those things that do, we can unlock the enormous potential of the magic 20 percent, and transform our effectiveness in our jobs, our careers, our businesses, and our lives.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"ty-wysiwyg-content content-files\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"ty-wysiwyg-content content-tags\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"ty-wysiwyg-content content-attachments\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"ty-wysiwyg-content content-required_products\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"ty-wysiwyg-content content-sb__deal_of_the_day\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"product-details\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"vs-scroller-container clearfix space-top\"\u003e \u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. and TOGETHER IS BETTER.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIn 2009, Simon Sinek started a movement to help people become more inspired at work, and in turn inspire their colleagues and customers. Since then, millions have been touched by the power of his ideas, including more than 28 million who’ve watched his TED Talk based on START WITH WHY -- the third most popular TED video of all time.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSinek starts with a fundamental question: Why are some people and organizations more innovative, more influential, and more profitable than others? Why do some command greater loyalty from customers and employees alike? Even among the successful, why are so few able to repeat their success over and over?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003ePeople like Martin Luther King Jr., Steve Jobs, and the Wright Brothers had little in common, but they all started with WHY. They realized that people won't truly buy into a product, service, movement, or idea until they understand the WHY behind it.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSTART WITH WHY shows that the leaders who've had the greatest influence in the world all think, act, and communicate the same way -- and it's the opposite of what everyone else does. Sinek calls this powerful idea The Golden Circle, and it provides a framework upon which organizations can be built, movements can be led, and people can be inspired. And it all starts with WHY.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Simplicity Survival Handbook: 32 Ways To Do Less And Accomplish More\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003eIn a world of more-better-faster, the challenges and stresses have never been greater: too much to do, not enough time. And in an economy where worker talent (know-how, energy, attention, commitment, and creativity) is at a premium, everyone is trying to maximize personal productivity. In The Simplicity Survival Handbook, Bill Jensen offers the antidote you're seeking: a practical guide to doing less in a world of more, and making it count. From \"How to Write Shorter Emails for Better Results\" to \"How to Use Your Mentor to Help You Do Less,\" Jensen offers step-by-step strategies, tactics, and techniques for communicating more effectively, setting priorities, and balancing the competing demands on your time, while avoiding the time-sinkers. He takes on corporate foolishness, walking you through how to be more productive and take greater control of your workday and, by extension, your life.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/64/68/38/ef09e704521abc5fe064ebb79f90b994.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/64/68/38/ef09e704521abc5fe064ebb79f90b994.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/64/68/38/ef09e704521abc5fe064ebb79f90b994.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/64/68/38/ef09e704521abc5fe064ebb79f90b994.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/64/68/38/ef09e704521abc5fe064ebb79f90b994.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/4b/3f/a4/ebcabd6603c1b08b8a299c060ff15699.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/4b/3f/a4/ebcabd6603c1b08b8a299c060ff15699.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/4b/3f/a4/ebcabd6603c1b08b8a299c060ff15699.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/4b/3f/a4/ebcabd6603c1b08b8a299c060ff15699.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/4b/3f/a4/ebcabd6603c1b08b8a299c060ff15699.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/54/c3/28/f8eae92a98c66a12ba7285708087f324.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/54/c3/28/f8eae92a98c66a12ba7285708087f324.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/54/c3/28/f8eae92a98c66a12ba7285708087f324.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/54/c3/28/f8eae92a98c66a12ba7285708087f324.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/54/c3/28/f8eae92a98c66a12ba7285708087f324.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/9c/b8/e6/2cafc6c1425355bd75dd5ca745ce9507.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/9c/b8/e6/2cafc6c1425355b \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eCreative Careers: Making A Living With Your Ideas\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eEarn a Living Doing What You Love\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eFeaturing insider advice from Daymond John, Karlie Kloss, Tim Ferriss, Randi Zuckerberg, Dave Asprey, Dennis Crowley, Brandon Maxwell, Mauro Porcini, Joy-Ann Reid, Roy Wood Jr., and dozens more!\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn one of the most popular classes at Parsons School of Design, B. Jeffrey Madoff gave students a reality check: \"Most of us have had the feeling of 'I could've done that,' whether at an art gallery, watching a performance, or finding a new product or even a new business idea. What's the difference between you and them? They actually did it. You didn't.\" With Creative Careers, you will learn how to do it, too: use your creativity; have a sustainable, profitable career; and do what you love.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eCreative Careers pulls from interviews with more than forty experts--notable entrepreneurs, artists, and business leaders--as well as from Madoff's own decades of experience to supercharge your career. Creativity can often feel sporadic and unfocused, coming in bursts and peaks. That's why Madoff focuses your professional path by asking vital questions that will ultimately help you:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Determine your value\u003cbr\u003e - Be smart about your hustle\u003cbr\u003e - Ruthlessly edit down your creative projects\u003cbr\u003e - Overcome fear and doubt\u003cbr\u003e - Create a successful, long-lasting career on your own terms\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eYou may aspire to join the fashion world, to work in visual arts, or to spearhead a start-up. You may be an executive who leads a creative team, or a professional looking to make a career change. Madoff takes you down an accessible path that will lead to success in any field or endeavor.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/ee/ff/2b/861dd8bb5fe95f9214ad944b2aebb931.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/ee/ff/2b/861dd8bb5fe95f9214ad944b2aebb931.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/ee/ff/2b/861dd8bb5fe95f9214ad944b2aebb931.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ee/ff/2b/861dd8bb5fe95f9214ad944b2aebb931.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ee/ff/2b/861dd8bb5fe95f9214ad944b2aebb931.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/80/6b/7c/07140e0087cc524989217feec168da27.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/80/6b/7c/07140e0087cc524989217feec168da27.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/80/6b/7c/07140e0087cc524989217feec168da27.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/80/6b/7c/07140e0087cc524989217feec168da27.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/80/6b/7c/07140e0087cc524989217feec168da27.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/b0/80/71/183de111b985c43f76ee0a639e9c354a.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/b0/80/71/183de111b985c43f76ee0a639e9c354a.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/b0/80/71/183de111b985c43f76ee0a639e9c354a.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b0/80/71/183de111b985c43f76ee0a639e9c354a.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b0/80/71/183de111b985c43f76ee0a639e9c354a.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/ba/be/01/e099ced035d80eab278e6c487d196a52.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/ba/be/01/e099ced035d80ea \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Story Factor: Inspiration, Influence, And Persuasion Through The Art Of Storytelling\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eFully revised, updated, and expanded, this modern classic will teach you to use the art of storytelling to persuade, motivate, and inspire in life and business\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAnyone seeking to influence others must first know their own story, and how to tell it properly. Whether you're proposing a risky new venture, trying to close a deal, or leading a charge against injustice, you have a story to tell. Tell it well and you will create a shared experience with your listeners that can have profound results.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn this modern classic, Annette Simmons reminds us that the oldest tool of influence is also the most powerful. Fully revised and updated to account for new technology and social media, along with two new chapters on the role of stories in the development of civilization and how to adjust your story to your specific goal, Simmons showcases over a hundred examples of effective storytelling drawn from the front lines of business and government, as well as myths, fables, and parables from around the world. Whether writing a screenplay, or announcing a corporate reorganization, Simmons illustrates how story can be used in ways that cold facts, bullet points, and directives can't. These stories, combined with practical storytelling techniques, show anyone how to become a more effective communicator and achieve their goals.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAgeProof: Living Longer Without Running Out Of Money Or Breaking A Hip\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTwo of the world's leading experts explain the vital link between health and wealth that could add years to your life and dollars to your retirement savings.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eAll the money in the world doesn't mean a thing if we can't get out of bed. And the healthiest body in the world won't stay that way if we're frazzled about five figures worth of debt. Today Show financial expert Jean Chatzky and the Cleveland Clinic's chief wellness officer Dr. Michael Roizen explain the vital connection between health and wealth--giving readers all the tactics, strategies, and know-how to live longer, healthier, more lucrative lives.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThe same principles that allow us to achieve a better body will allow us to do the same for our investment portfolio. For instance, physical and financial stability comes down to the same equation: Inflow versus outflow. Do we burn more calories than we ingest? Likewise, are we making more money than we spend? The authors detail scientific ways to improve our behavior so that the answers tilt in the readers' favor. They also offer ways to beat the system by automating how we do things and limiting our decisions in the face of too much food or too much debt.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eChatzky and Roizen provide a plan for both financial independence and biological strength with action steps to get you there.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThis Is Day One: A Practical Guide To Leadership That Matters\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBased on his TEDx talk \"Everyday Leadership (the Lollipop Moment)\" -- voted one of the 15 most inspirational TED talks of all time -- This Is Day One is leadership expert Drew Dudley's guide to cultivating the behaviors that will help you to succeed and empower those around you.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIf you're intimidated by the mystique surrounding leadership, this book is for you. Dudley simplifies leadership without denying its complexity, demonstrating that leadership in all its forms begins at the same clear and accessible place for everyone: what he calls \"Day One.\"\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDay One is when you discover, define, and start to consistently deliver on your foundational leadership values. Living that day over and over is what creates leaders, and Dudley provides the key tools necessary to craft and commit to your own personal Day One, including:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eA step-by-step process designed to surface your core leadership values and embed them into your daily behavior\u003cbr\u003e A roadmap to behavioral changes proven to increase commitment, pride, productivity, and happiness\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eInsights into key leadership values that drive performance and impact\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eSharing the process that led him through battles with alcohol, obesity, and personal tragedy, Dudley shows you how to develop a relentless commitment to the daily behaviors that will make you a better executive, coach, or teacher, and how you can inspire others to do the same.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eMost of the leadership on the planet comes from people who don't see themselves as leaders. This Is Day One shows you how to start changing that. Through the insights of leaders of all types -- CEOs, elite athletes, cab drivers, custodians, and everyone in between -- Dudley helps you understand what your Day One needs to look like, reminds you why you're a leader, and makes clear what you can do about it--starting today, on Day One.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBossed Up: A Grown Woman's Guide To Getting Your Sh*t Together\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eIn this candid, refreshing guide for young women to take with us as we run the world, Emilie Aries shows you how to own your power, know your worth, and design your career and life accordingly.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eYoung women today face an uncertain job market, the pressure to ascend at all costs, and a fear of burning out. But the landscape is changing, and women are taking an assertive role in shaping our careers and lives, while investing more and more in our community of support.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eBossed Up teaches you how to:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e- Break out of the \"martyrdom mindset,\" and cultivate your Boss Identity by getting clear on what you really want for your career and life without apology;\u003cbr\u003e - Hone the self-advocacy skills necessary for success;\u003cbr\u003e - Understand the differences between being assertive (which is part of being a leader) and being aggressive (which is more like being a bully) - and how that clarity can transform your trajectory;\u003cbr\u003e - Beat burnout by identifying how the warning signs may be showing up in your life and how to prioritize bringing more rest, purpose, agency, and community to your day-to-day life;\u003cbr\u003e - Unpack the steps to cultivating something more than just confidence; a boss identity, which will establish your ability to be the boss of your life no matter what comes your way.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eDrawing from timely research, and with personal stories, and spotlights on a diverse group of women from the Bossed Up community, this book will show you how to craft a happy, healthy, and sustainable career path you'll love.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu Beyond\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThe whirlwind of job applications, interviews, follow-up, resume building, and networking is just the beginning. What happens after you've landed the job, settled in, and begun to make a difference-where do you go from here? What if you feel stuck in what you thought would be your dream profession? \u003cem\u003eNew York Times\u003c/em\u003e bestselling author Mika Brzezinski and producer Daniela Pierre-Bravo provide an essential manual for those crucial next steps. \u003cem\u003eEarn It!\u003c/em\u003e is a practical career guidebook that not only helps you get your foot in the door; it also shows you how to negotiate a raise, advocate for more responsibility, and figure out whether you're in the career that's right for you.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eA blueprint for your future success,\u003cem\u003e Earn It!\u003c/em\u003e features insightful and inspiring interviews with leaders in media, fashion, and business, recruiters, HR, execs, and kickass young female entrepreneurs like Danielle Weisberg and Carly Zakin of theSkimm, Vimeo CEO Anjali Sud, and Jane Park, founder of the cosmetic subscription company Julep.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài In The Hustle Economy, we give you 25 essays from founders, writers, producers, game makers, artists, and creative types from every path who share one common trait -- they are all self-made hustlers who have managed to turn their creativity into careers.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eIn this collection you will find essays from:\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eProducer and performer Mike Rugnetta on why \"Do what you love\" is both the best and worst piece of advice you'll ever receive.\u003cbr\u003e Author, television writer, and humorist Emma Koenig on staying focused and productive no matter what life throws at you.\u003cbr\u003e Web comic Zach Weinersmith on the equation for success and using your creativity to do what the rest of us won't.\u003cbr\u003e Trendspotter Jess Kimball Leslie on identifying your skills and turning it into a successful career.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThis book exists to inspire and inform. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/76/75/c8/6d1787ece43cff6623104331a9abe621.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/76/75/c8/6d1787ece43cff6623104331a9abe621.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/76/75/c8/6d1787ece43cff6623104331a9abe621.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/76/75/c8/6d1787ece43cff6623104331a9abe621.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/76/75/c8/6d1787ece43cff6623104331a9abe621.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/ed/14/44/c29c678e776cf4236cf2df8ac6aa01b2.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/ed/14/44/c29c678e776cf4236cf2df8ac6aa01b2.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/ed/14/44/c29c678e776cf4236cf2df8ac6aa01b2.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ed/14/44/c29c678e776cf4236cf2df8ac6aa01b2.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/ed/14/44/c29c678e776cf4236cf2df8ac6aa01b2.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/b6/46/90/d154f0afdc7ab54c203eb3ea8cd54984.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/b6/46/90/d154f0afdc7ab54c203eb3ea8cd54984.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/b6/46/90/d154f0afdc7ab54c203eb3ea8cd54984.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b6/46/90/d154f0afdc7ab54c203eb3ea8cd54984.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b6/46/90/d154f0afdc7ab54c203eb3ea8cd54984.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/f0/de/98/79293f77b48524996e76b1fdf1a13156.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/f0/de/98/79293f77b485249 \u003chead\u003e\u003c/head\u003e\n \u003cbody\u003e\n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Anxious Investor: Mastering The Mental Game Of Investing\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eA revelatory new guide to becoming a smarter investor, drawing upon behavioral psychology, economic modeling, and market history to offer practical advice for reaching your financial goals\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\"With the equity and fixed-income markets off to a rough start in 2022, investors might do well to review the lessons shared in Mr. Nations’s book.\" —Wall Street Journal\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eThe human brain is ill-suited to making wise investment decisions. We are overconfident in our own knowledge and hunches, terrible at assessing risk, and prone to chasing financial thrills rather than measured long-term goals. Making matters worse, periods of severe market turbulence—whether the dotcom bubble of the late 90’s, the Great Recession a decade later, or the brief, vertiginous COVID crash of 2020—bring out our most irrational selves, at the exact moment when the consequences for investment mistakes are most severe.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eScott Nations has spent his career studying market volatility. His firm, Nations Indexes, is the world’s leading independent developer of volatility and option-enhanced indexes. In The Anxious Investor, he teaches readers how to understand markets, master their own fear, and make the most of their money. Drawing upon cutting-edge research in behavioral psychology, Nations shows that the secrets to excellent investing lie in mastering the quirks of human psychology. How are some investors able to make prudent decisions under pressure, while others rely on gut instinct to disastrous effect? How can we prepare for a market crash before it happens? And what can help us stay the course when the waters get choppy? Using the stories of three infamous market bubbles as his backdrop, Nations offers readers history’s hard-earned lessons about greed, volatility, and value.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align: justify;\"\u003eWhether you’re saving for retirement, a home, or a child’s college education, The Anxious Investor offers a blueprint for achieving your goals. While we can never know exactly which financial surprises may loom ahead, here is an indispensable resource for investors to make sense of them.\u003c/p\u003e\n \u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu Fear. Self-Pity. Intolerance. Anger. As Bill P. explains, these are the 'rocks' that can sink recovery- or at the least, block further progress. This generation has just entered, or will soon be entering, the work force and they have no idea how to invest, save or handle their money. Young people today come out of school having had little or no formal education on the basics of money management. Many have large debts from student loans looming over their heads and many feel confused and powerless when their pricey educations don't translate into high paying jobs. They feel that their $30,000-$40,000 salary is too meager to bother with investing, and they constantly fear that there will be 'too much month left at the end of their money'. Douglas R. Andrew has shown the parents of this generation a different pathway to financial freedom. NICE GIRLS DON'T GET RICH, Dr. Frankel offers women financial and investment advice for succeeding in life. Although women may not know it, certain behaviors and habits that they learned when they were girls are now preventing them from attaining financial fulfillment, such as: depending on men for financial advice and/or support, mistaking negotiation for confrontation, fear of math and numbers, spending indiscriminately, playing it safe and operating on financial autopilot. But unlike the many books written by financial professionals, this book isn't just about financial planning --it's about financial thinking. As a psychologist and successful business woman, Frankel examines the myths and messages women learn over time that prevent them from reaping the same financial rewards as men.
