 \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eNAMED ONE OF THE BEST BOOKS OF THE YEAR BY\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eBLOOMBERG\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003eAND\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eLIBRARY JOURNAL\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003eWhere does great culture come from? How do you build and sustain it in your group, or strengthen a culture that needs fixing?\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003eIn\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eThe Culture Code,\u003c/em\u003e\u0026nbsp;Daniel Coyle goes inside some of the world’s most successful organizations—including the U.S. Navy’s SEAL Team Six, IDEO, and the San Antonio Spurs—and reveals what makes them tick. He demystifies the culture-building process by identifying three key skills that generate cohesion and cooperation, and explains how diverse groups learn to function with a single mind. Drawing on examples that range from Internet retailer Zappos to the comedy troupe Upright Citizens Brigade to a daring gang of jewel thieves, Coyle offers specific strategies that trigger learning, spark collaboration, build trust, and drive positive change. Coyle unearths helpful stories of failure that illustrate what\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003enot\u003c/em\u003e\u0026nbsp;to do, troubleshoots common pitfalls, and shares advice about reforming a toxic culture. Combining leading-edge science, on-the-ground insights from world-class leaders, and practical ideas for action,\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eThe Culture Code\u003c/em\u003e\u0026nbsp;offers a roadmap for creating an environment where innovation flourishes, problems get solved, and expectations are exceeded.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003eCulture is not something you are—it’s something you do.\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eThe Culture Code\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003eputs the power in your hands. No matter the size of your group or your goal, this book can teach you the principles of cultural chemistry that transform individuals into teams that can accomplish amazing things together.\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ePraise for\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eThe Culture Code\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003e“I’ve been waiting years for someone to write this book—I’ve built it up in my mind into something extraordinary. But it is even better than I imagined. Daniel Coyle has produced a truly brilliant, mesmerizing read that demystifies the magic of great groups. It blows all other books on culture right out of the water.”\u003cstrong\u003e—Adam Grant,\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eNew York Times\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003ebestselling author of\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eOption B, Originals,\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003eand\u003cem\u003e\u0026nbsp;Give and Take\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e \n  \u003cp style=\"text-align:justify\"\u003e“If you want to understand how successful groups work—the signals they transmit, the language they speak, the cues that foster creativity—you won’t find a more essential guide than\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eThe Culture Code\u003c/em\u003e.”\u003cstrong\u003e—Charles Duhigg,\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003eNew York Times\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003ebestselling author of\u003cem\u003e\u0026nbsp;The Power of Habit\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003eand\u003cem\u003e\u0026nbsp;Smarter Faster Better\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu đồng).....\u003c/p\u003e","images":[{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/73/c1/9d/b0a5a62acf4f2f870d4146d32474f75d.jpg","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/73/c1/9d/b0a5a62acf4f2f870d4146d32474f75d.jpg","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/73/c1/9d/b0a5a62acf4f2f870d4146d32474f75d.jpg","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/73/c1/9d/b0a5a62acf4f2f870d4146d32474f75d.jpg","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/73/c1/9d/b0a5a62acf4f2f870d4146d32474f75d.jpg"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/68/d9/e7/f269c3328335ad7ad7fbf246838ed042.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/68/d9/e7/f269c3328335ad7ad7fbf246838ed042.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/68/d9/e7/f269c3328335ad7ad7fbf246838ed042.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/68/d9/e7/f269c3328335ad7ad7fbf246838ed042.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/68/d9/e7/f269c3328335ad7ad7fbf246838ed042.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/b8/97/cf/7aed837a3ab249381e11f855ad3a2c93.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/b8/97/cf/7aed837a3ab249381e11f855ad3a2c93.png","medium_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w300/ts/product/b8/97/cf/7aed837a3ab249381e11f855ad3a2c93.png","position":null,"small_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b8/97/cf/7aed837a3ab249381e11f855ad3a2c93.png","thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/200x280/ts/product/b8/97/cf/7aed837a3ab249381e11f855ad3a2c93.png"},{"base_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/ts/product/fc/2b/47/78b42eb5c92d38c7968ebf03cc771e3a.png","is_gallery":true,"label":null,"large_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/w1200/ts/product/fc/2b/47/78b42eb5c92d38c giá","favourite_count":0,"thumbnail_url":"https://salt.tikicdn.com/cache/280x280/ts/product/9d/5f/90/1bf974b32d582e1cc089309a69cdcb72.png","has_ebook":false,"inventory_status":"available","inventory_type":"backorder","productset_group_name":"","is_fresh":false,"seller":null,"is_flower":false,"has_buynow":true,"is_gift_card":false,"salable_type":null,"data_version":3300,"day_ago_created":2530,"all_time_quantity_sold":2,"meta_title":"","meta_description":"","meta_keywords":"","is_baby_milk":false,"is_acoholic_drink":false,"description":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Right And Wrong Stuff: How Brilliant Careers Are Made And Unmade\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eNearly a quarter century ago Carter Cast seemed to have it all together: he had a first-class education, an all-American athletic career, and was a very bright and energetic rising star on the fast track at a Fortune 100 company, PepsiCo. But blissfully unaware of how negative perceptions were shaped, he was stunned when called into his boss's office, and told he was \"unpromotable\" because he was \"obstinate,\" \"resistant,\" and \"insubordinate.\"\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eBaffled, scared, and embarrassed, that defining moment led to Cast's years-long effort to try to understand why he came so close to going off track, discovering that what he saw as idiosyncratic was actually widespread. His research shows that 98 percent of people have at least one derailment risk factor and that half to two-thirds actually go off the rails. More often than not, people get fired, demoted, or plateau not because they lack the \"right stuff,\" but because they let the \"wrong stuff\" act out. Derailment often afflicts talented people who are either unaware of a debilitating weakness or an interpersonal blind spot, or are arrogant enough to believe that feedback doesn't apply to them. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eCast's experiences and research led to five defining archetypes--Captain Fantastic, the One-Trick Pony, the Solo Flyer, Version 1.0, and the Whirling Dervish--that express traits that cut across gender and every level of seniority and that play out everywhere, from big corporations to small law firms, from education institutions to raw start-ups. He shows how these archetypes fail and succeed, and how to recognize blind spots that can lead to downfall. He provides ways to improve self-understanding--digging into topics like values, needs, and motives--and provides the reader with new ways to take charge of his or her career.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eGiá sản phẩm trên Tiki đã bao gồm thuế theo luật hiện hành. Bên cạnh đó, tuỳ vào loại sản phẩm, hình thức và địa chỉ giao hàng mà có thể phát sinh thêm chi phí khác như phí vận chuyển, phụ phí hàng cồng kềnh, thuế nhập khẩu (đối với đơn hàng giao từ nước ngoài có giá trị trên 1 triệu
